name: Liz Rice
tagline: Chief Open Source Officer at Isovalent (Cisco), eBPF expert, and CNCF TOC Emeritus Chair
bio: Liz Rice is Chief Open Source Officer at Isovalent (now part of Cisco) and Emeritus Chair of the CNCF Technical Oversight Committee. She's a leading expert in eBPF, container security, and cloud-native technologies, and author of 'Learning eBPF' and 'Container Security'.
